title: Purchasing skins issue
body:
I just added 50$ into my league account as a subway gift card, which is totally 7200rp(with more than 75rp that already in it) and bought the Janna new skin bundle, also with the new Fiora skin, both must cost a total of 3480rp=1350rp + 2130rp. but I received 2445rp instead of 3720rp. Then I found that!

Please help, i'm still a school student, I don't usually have that much money, so please help me with this situation

replies.body: Hey I was able to verify that you were double charged for the Fiora skin.  I've fixed that up for you, so your RP balance has been corrected!
